y="766" width="374.5" height="344" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-4" value="import { Role, ServicePrincipal } from 'aws-cdk-lib/aws-iam';" id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-5" value="import * as cdk from 'aws-cdk-lib';" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1773.5" y="770" width="200" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-6" value="const app = new cdk.App();" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1773.5" y="840" width="159" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-7" value="const stack = new cdk.Stack(app);" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1773.5" y="861" width="189.75" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-8" value="new Function(stack, 'MyLambda', {<div>&nbsp; &nbsp; handler: 'index.handler',</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; runtime: Runtime.NodeJS_22_X,</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; code: Code.fromInlien(`</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">exports.handler = async(args) =&gt; {</span><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; let response = {</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">statusCode: 200,</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">body: JSON.stringify("Hello</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp;From Lambda")</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	 };</span><br></span></div><div>	 <span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	 </span>return response;</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">&nbsp; </span>`)</div><div><span style="font-size: 12px;">});</span><br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1774.5" y="900" width="310" height="191" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-9" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=#666666;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2150" y="766" width="430" height="604" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-10" value="CDKアプリ内でのコード" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1794.87" y="736" width="269.25" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-11" value="生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート<div>(一部)</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2180" y="726" width="370" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-12" value="Resources:<div><br></div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; MyLambdaRole&lt;ハッシュ値&gt;:</span></div><div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type: 'AWS::IAM::Role'</div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Properties:</span><br></div></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; AssumeRolePolicyDocument:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Version: '2012-10-17',</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Statement:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - Effect: 'Allow'</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Principal:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Service:</span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - 'lambda.amazonaws.com'</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Action:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - 'sts.AssumeRole'</span></div></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ManagedPolicyArns:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - Fn::Join:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - ""</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - - "arn:"</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - Ref: AWS::Partition</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; - :iam::</span>as:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole<br></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="2159.99" y="780" width="410.01" height="330" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GjTJxGkr6oRxlbieXluJ-13" value="<span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; MyLambda:</span><br><div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Type: 'AWS::Lambda::Function'</div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Properties:</span><br></div></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Handler: 'index.handler'</span><br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Runtime: '</span>nodes22.x<span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">'<br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Role: !GetAtt&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">MyLambdaRole&lt;ハッシュ値&gt;.Arn</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Code:</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Zipfile: |-</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; exports.handler = async(args) =&gt; {</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; let response = {</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; statusCode: 200,</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span>body: JSON.stringift("Hello From Lambda")<br></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; return response;</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };</span><span style="font-size: 12.000001px;"><br></span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 267px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 296px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート
(一部)

switch.text: 生成されるCloudFormationのテンプレート...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 408px; height: 1px; padding-top: 285px; margin-left: 422px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Resources:
MyLambdaRole<ハッシュ値>:
Type: 'AWS::IAM::Role'
Properties:
AssumeRolePolicyDocument:
Version: '2012-10-17',
Statement:
- Effect: 'Allow'
Principal:
Service:
- 'lambda.amazonaws.com'
Action:
- 'sts.AssumeRole'
ManagedPolicyArns:
- Fn::Join:
- ""
- - "arn:"
- Ref: AWS::Partition
- :iam::as:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 351px; height: 1px; padding-top: 585px; margin-left: 429px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 357px; height: 1px; padding-top: 165px; margin-left: 36px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Lambda関数のL2コンストラクトであるFunctionを利用して
リソースを作成するとデフォルトでLambda用のIAM Roleが自動で作成される

switch.text: Lambda関数のL2コンストラクトであるFunctionを利用して...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
